website_summaries.verdict: Tops our list for its durable build, compact size, and effectiveness. Although highly sensitive, this feature often comes in handy when training dogs not to bark at every noise.
pros: Updated to work better than previous models, dog owners praise this small, automatic device for its high degree of effectiveness
Offers three levels and can reach as far as 50 feet on the most intense setting
cons: Quite sensitive, so noises other than barking are likely to activate it
As with any device in its class, it may not deter all canines' urges to bark

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: It does not do what it says will do. Dogs continue to bark. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waster your money! Does NOT work!
customer_reviews.text: This product has not worked at all! I was very hopeful after reading all the good reviews but the schnauzers next door keep barking like I never put the thing up!
customer_reviews.author: bajoyful1

customer_reviews.title: Nah, it blew
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucked. It didn’t help my idiot pug. I know he’s an idiot but I was hoping it would at least help a little.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Cash grab, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the most worthless products I've ever used It did not work from the get-go still does not work now after several weeks
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lord of Lexington

customer_reviews.title: Quiet nights with the windows open again!
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors dog barks and barks at all times of the night. Not any more! I was utterly amazed, barking started, I turned it on “3” because the dog is 1-2 houses away. QUIET. I wish I would had bought this 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: KateC_Reader

customer_reviews.title: Quiet nights!
customer_reviews.text: Used this while ‘dog sitting’. Poor pup was not used to our home and barked throughout the first nights. Got this and had quiet nights for the rest of the stay.
customer_reviews.author: KMcC

customer_reviews.title: It is an unproven piece of product like an invisible insect repellant
customer_reviews.text: It just did not work. Sat with 4 different dogs and had this turned on to level 3. The idea is for the dogs to react to the signals it sends in response to the dogs barking. Did the light turn red when the dogs barked - YES Did the dog react differently as if a different noise has been generated by this device - NO 4 different dogs had zero reaction - tested this for almost 1 full month with no use. It was weather proof so it still blinks and shows all the lights as needed, but is it functioning as advertised? NO So this is a definite no from me. Waste of money here.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if you have crappy neighbors with loud dogs. I've had multiple conversations with my neighbor about their dog's 6 am barking and nothing was done. I got this and zip tied it to a tree, aiming it at their yard. It's on the lowest setting and it took less than a week to solve the baking problem. It's smaller than I expected, but that just makes it easier to put up.
customer_reviews.author: lisa c

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: My family lives in a community villa with homes very close together. All it took to ruin my day/week was one lazy neighbor letting his barking dog outside at 515 am and waking me up for the rest of the morning. I was desperate when I bought this product. I've heard one brief barking spell from my neighbor's dog in the two weeks after I started using it. I get to sleep during reasonable hours again. The product is guaranteed and now I don't have to get my HOA involved.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Works on most dogs!!
customer_reviews.text: It works for my big dog, not my older dog or the smallest one. But it works on the neighbor dogs which is a good thing! They don't bark my dogs dont bark!! Also I carry it when I take the big dog for a walk so theres no barking from her or any other dog we pass by!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy P

customer_reviews.title: Young Beagle/Condo No Barking!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our young beagle who howled whenever we kenneled him when leaving our condo for a few hours. Had to use the 2nd setting in our small condo but within 1 day he learned not to bark/howl. He now only barks for about 1 minute before device helps him to remember not to. He then relaxes and lays down. We have a camera in the condo so we can see/hear him and know it is working. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: We have tried other sonic devices and shock collars to stop our 85 pound dig from barking. This is has worked far better that anything else we've tried. Results were very quick, and the device has worked well for a few weeks. No signs the battery dying yet. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Frank G. Pratt III

customer_reviews.title: Stopped neighbors 3 dogs from barking every time I garden
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this would stop next door neighbors dogs from going berserk every time I went into my backyard after seeing other reviews. It DID. Changed my life. Lowest setting placed on fence near where dogs always bark at me did it after about a week. It’s one of the best things I ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Works for my energetic golden retriever
customer_reviews.text: The item is very simple and easy to operate, took it out of the box, did a quick test and it was ready to go. I have a 3 years old golden retriever that howls during the day when I'm away. it became disturbing to the neighbors so I had to find a solution quick. I tried out this device and the results were stunning, he would only howl once or twice at the most (I get notifications on my furbo camera), overall I am very impressed and happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LivingLegend

customer_reviews.title: Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective. We have a couple of rescue dogs. One barks like a mad dog at anyone who comes near our house. I bought two one for both sides of our yard. We have a 1/4 acre corner lot with lots of trees and shrubs. Oh, and did I mention the community mailbox next to our fence? It has cut down on the barking significantly. I know that when I hear her. It is time to change the batteries. I'm going through some old Rayovac 9 volts and they last me a couple of weeks before it is time to change. High-quality batteries might last longer.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: omg i love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my dogs would always bark at night. It took a while for it to work but now as soon as I turn it on my dogs are silent. I love it. My dogs don't bark as much as they usually do even with it turned off. :)
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Works only for young dogs with good hearing
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 4 of 5 stars because it works but only for younger dogs. Our oldest dog who barks the most is completely unaffected by it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: it does not deter my dogs from barking at all. we use it indoors and I feel every noise that we make must set it off because the battery dies super fast. doesn't work for my dogs and i gave it a good chance and im sure its to late to return by now.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Does not recognize chihuahua bark.
customer_reviews.text: Our chihuahua barks non-stop at squirrels and birds. The device does not even recognize the dog's barking so it certainly won't put out a sound to stop the barking. Waste of my money. It says "Safe for All Dogs"; it certainly is for mine.
customer_reviews.author: silverbach

customer_reviews.title: Jack Russell? Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Never effected the female Jack Russell at all. She's a loud dog and it did nothing. Have 4 dogs. The other dogs didn't like it at first, but they quickly got used to hearing it so often that it no longer effects them. I really hoped for the best. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Daneyah

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical about the effectiveness of the technology behind this product until I turned it on during a bark-fest from the neighbors dog. It was immediate. I have used it multiple times and everytime I turn it on the dog barks once, its ears fold down in confusion and goes and lays down never to be heard from the rest of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pancost

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at All Cost. Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: Avoid Avoid Avoid. Piece of junk that never had any affect on our puppy EVER!!!!!! Way over priced. We got a shock collar (also has loud beep sound) that was AWESOME!!!! Trained our puppy perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Gman from (Maryland)

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if it would work and I hated to spend the money but this is worth it. The dogs next door used to charge the fence at us and bark constantly. Now they don't. I used it 3 days in a row and reinforced it with verbal commands. I said "bad dog" while using the device. Now I don't have to use the device I just say the words "bad dog" and they stop barking. I have to use the highest setting on the smaller dog but the bigger dog responds to the lower setting
customer_reviews.author: pleased

customer_reviews.title: So far barking reduced
customer_reviews.text: I just put this up, we'll see if it works. So far he hasn't been barking as usual. We'll see what happens when his enemy comes around!
customer_reviews.author: bookaholic in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Works to well, only turned on twice
customer_reviews.text: My small dog would bark at everything-leaves, birds, when I would say “ who’s that “ now she doesn’t bark at all, maybe I can get her to when we play, but then something beeped and she ran to me scared.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work on 3 different dogs
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for our dog at all. The light flashes like it is supposed to - but our dog (and both of our neighbors dogs) acted as if there was no sounds affecting them at all. We were so hopeful that it would work - but it doesn’t!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working to stop constant barking by neighbor’s dogs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn’t react to it - at all. No she isn’t old (3 years old) or hard or hearing, she looked at it very nonchalantlay when it first went off but then stopped paying any attention to it whatsoever. The indicator was coming on showing it was sounding off and she just wasn’t phased whatsoever
customer_reviews.author: K. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t seem to work
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t even phase my golden doodle. My chihuahua stopped barking for about a week and then went right back to barking.
customer_reviews.author: Teyah Latimer

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I gave the product 2 months and of course I am past the return date. It did not help with my animals at all. It didn't even phase them.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnna Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Non working  apparatus
customer_reviews.text: Had this outside in hopes that my two small dogs would get a hint and even the dogs next door. Big joke.
customer_reviews.author: Lori S.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong just didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about a week and didn't change a thing! Dogs continue to bark so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Powell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for all dogs
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for my German Shepherd or Belgian Malinois, they just barked at it. Did stop my neighbors dog from barking tho.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I never was able to tell it worked at all
customer_reviews.text: I got it to stop neighbors barking dog but distance was more than 50’ so dog was not in that 50’ range. Needs to work at greater distances. I walked with it and tried to see if it worked within a 50’ range but never stopped a dog from barking.
customer_reviews.author: George Hardeman

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Finally something that worked for my persistent Barker! Update worked until about a month ago. Green light is still flashing to indicate it is on but it no longer works evidenced by a lack of the red light when she barks. Debating whether it is worth replacing every 3 months. Kind of bummed
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It quit working a week after the return window closed. Not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Mazurik

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For My Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Bummer. I was really hopeful, but this does not work for my dogs at all. The light flashes red when they bark, but they couldn't care less about whatever sound the box is emitting. The citronella collar has worked the best so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give it time for my dogs to adjust and it doesn't work. Now I'm past my return window and can't get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing
customer_reviews.text: My Border Collie hates birds apparently and so whenever there is a bird in the yard or a tree that he can see the barking begins. Even a loud chirp will send him flying out the door. When I have the Barking Device on, he will run to the spot and look at the bird but there is NO BARKING!!!!! YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Nile

customer_reviews.title: Not effective after a few days
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first 5 days and unfortunately after that, this device didn’t even phase my dogs even on the highest level. They continue to bark right through the nose... changed the batteries and continue to be u effective on them. I live in a small apartment and it is definitely within radius of my small dogs
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Try something else
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it seemed to work for a second , he was scared but then Started barking. He stayed out of the room I put it in. But that didn't matter he barked just as much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on May 27th 2019. I have 6 dogs. I doesn't work on non of them. I moved it around, inside the house, outside the house, the dogs bark like crazy still. Nothing has changed. If I can get my money back I would.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Doesn’t work. I have 2 dogs and neighbors with dogs all around me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 small dogs. I've had this thing for about 2 weeks. Tried it in multiple locations and all the different intensity settings. While my dogs seemed to have reacted to it at first, now they just ignore it and continue to bark. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M

customer_reviews.title: this did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: we are trying, unsuccessfully, to keep our dogs from barking too much. This did not work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S.......

customer_reviews.title: What a waste and a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This item had no effect on my dogs. What a waste. I would definitely not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rego

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and put them outside as recommended in the front lawn. Didn't have any impact on either dog we own; a lab and a hound. Checked batteries were working and made sounds that did cause the lights to signal but our dogs didn't notice anything different.
customer_reviews.author: Kconley

customer_reviews.title: Depends on the dog
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 dogs. 2 adults and 1 puppy. This works very well for the adult dogs, but the puppy could care less about the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: It did nothing for my dogs barking. He still continued to bark and lights were flashing like instructions said they would. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not efficient  enough
customer_reviews.text: My dog is still bark, it just cause his attention whenever he barks, he looks at the device , but he still barks, it seems that the device does not affect his barking, he did not scare much about the device, if he scared. He will stop barking?
customer_reviews.author: Thy

customer_reviews.title: Wasted of money
customer_reviews.text: Hahahaha this thing dosnt do anything, I have 3 small dogs and no matter how HARD they bark this waste of money dont do nothing
customer_reviews.author: sandy baron

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs still bark. I think they may even bark more.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant D.

customer_reviews.title: Nope didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work for my dog. On high he just ignored it
customer_reviews.author: Angela Phares

customer_reviews.title: NO Good
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all for my Australian cattle dog
customer_reviews.author: Dean England

customer_reviews.title: Fairly effective, worth trying
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be effective on most annoying neighboring dogs . Provides some relief & worth trying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worthless
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work at all. Set up about 10 feet from the neighbor's barking dog and it did not phase him.
customer_reviews.author: KTWaddell

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I use it inside. My dog constantly barked out our front windows. Sometimes we referred it to a meltdown. After putting up the bark box no more barking or meltdowns. It totally solved our problem
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Yetter

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a week
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a week. My dog is seemingly not phased by it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: DOG SILENCER
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK WHEN IT IS OPERATING THE DOG BARKS RIGHT THRU IT
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Nothing Ultrasonic works on our dog. Second time I have tried an ultrasonic device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bark,bark,doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Never worked. Dog barking was not diminished in any way. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Fox

customer_reviews.title: Worked only 1 day, then didn't. Sad had high hopes.
customer_reviews.text: Worked on Day 1, on Day 2 nope. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: maggie and marty

customer_reviews.title: No effect
customer_reviews.text: Had no effect on either of my two dogs over the life of one battery, unsure if I can still return this product or if there are any other options
customer_reviews.author: JasonW

customer_reviews.title: No more spendy bark collars!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Our dog stopped barking immediately after he heard the noise. Can go inside or outside. Super tiny and not even noticeable but works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this item!!! It does not work. It was a total waste of money. It really deserves a negative rating, but that is not possible.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: It's a MIRACLE!
customer_reviews.text: Our barky little Maltese no longer goes outside and barks for the sheer annoyance of it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Night saver!
customer_reviews.text: We used it a couple of nights and our huskimo quickly learned that barking at night was not acceptable!

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: Noticed zero difference with my dog barking. It doesn’t phase her at all.

customer_reviews.title: May work for toy breeds
customer_reviews.text: Had the unit for a few weeks but it seem to have no effect on my on my 75lb American Bulldog
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: INEFFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: Product was ineffective in stopping my dog's barking. WAS NOT WORTH THE MONEY!

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all a total waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: Dosnt work.
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work at all. Waste of money.
